6121.name: Double Edged Sword
description:
Melee: Deal 3% additional damage, take 1.5% additional damage.

Ranged: Deal and take 2% additional damage

6122.name: Feast
description: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (20 second cooldown)

description: +0.4% Lifesteal and Spell Vamp
+0.8% Lifesteal and Spell Vamp
+1.2% Lifesteal and Spell Vamp

6134.name: Natural Talent
description: +2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power at level 18 (0.11 Attack Damage and 0.16 Ability Power per level)
+4 Attack Damage and 6 Ability Power at level 18 (0.22 Attack Damage and 0.32 Ability Power per level)
+6 Attack Damage and 9 Ability Power at level 18 (0.33 Attack Damage and 0.5 Ability Power per level)
+8 Attack Damage and 12 Ability Power at level 18 (0.44 Attack Damage and 0.66 Ability Power per level)
+10 Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power at level 18 (0.55 Attack Damage and 0.83 Ability Power per level)

6141.name: Bounty Hunter
description: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed

6142.name: Oppressor
description: Deal 2.5% increased damage to targets with impaired movement (slow, stun, root, taunt, etc.)

6151.name: Battering Blows
description: +1.4% Armor Penetration
+2.8% Armor Penetration

description: +1.4% Magic Penetration
+2.8% Magic Penetration
+4.2% Magic Penetration
+5.6% Magic Penetration
+7% Magic Penetration

6161.name: Warlord's Bloodlust
description: Your critical strikes on enemy champions heal you for 15% of the damage dealt and grant you 20% attack speed for 4 seconds (2 second cooldown)

6162.name: Fervor of Battle
description: Your attacks and spells grant stacks of Fervor for 5 seconds (max 10 stacks). Each stack adds 1-8 bonus physical damage to basic attacks against champions (based on your level)

6164.name: Deathfire Touch
description:
Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage equal to 6 + 50% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 20% of your Ability Power, over 3 seconds

Area of effect and damage over time abilities apply half of this damage over 1.5 seconds instead

6311.name: Wanderer
description: +0.6% Movement Speed out of combat
+1.2% Movement Speed out of combat
+1.8% Movement Speed out of combat
+2.4% Movement Speed out of combat
+3% Movement Speed out of combat

6312.name: Savagery
description: Single target attacks and spells deal 1 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 2 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 3 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 4 bonus damage to minions and monsters
Single target attacks and spells deal 5 bonus damage to minions and monsters

6321.name: Runic Affinity
description: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer

6322.name: Secret Stash
description:
Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer.

Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 20 Health and 10 Mana instantly on use

6331.name: Merciless
description: Deal 1% increased damage to champions below 40% Health
Deal 2% increased damage to champions below 40% Health
Deal 3% increased damage to champions below 40% Health
Deal 4% increased damage to champions below 40% Health
Deal 5% increased damage to champions below 40% Health

6332.name: Meditation
description: Regenerate 0.3% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 0.6% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 0.9% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 1.2% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds
Regenerate 1.5% of your missing Mana every 5 seconds

6342.name: Bandit
description:
Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally.

Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)

6343.name: Dangerous Game
description: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana

6351.name: Precision
description: Gain 0.6 + 0.06 per level Armor and Magic Penetration
Gain 1.2 + 0.12 per level Armor and Magic Penetration
Gain 1.8 + 0.18 per level Armor and Magic Penetration
Gain 2.4 + 0.24 per level Armor and Magic Penetration
Gain 3 + 0.3 per level Armor and Magic Penetration

6352.name: Intelligence
description: Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 41% and you gain 1% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 42% and you gain 2% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 43% and you gain 3% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 44% and you gain 4% Cooldown Reduction
Your Cooldown Reduction cap is increased to 45% and you gain 5% Cooldown Reduction

6361.name: Stormraider's Surge
description: Dealing 30% of a champion's max Health within 2 seconds grants you 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown).

6362.name: Thunderlord's Decree
description:
Your 3rd attack or spell on an enemy champion calls down a lightning strike, dealing magic damage in the area.

Damage: 10 per level, plus 20% of your Bonus Attack Damage, and 10% of your Ability Power (20 second cooldown).

6363.name: Windspeaker's Blessing
description: Your heals and shields are 10% stronger. Additionally, your shields and heals on other allies increase their resistances by 15% for 3 seconds.

6211.name: Recovery
description: +0.4 Health per 5 seconds
+0.8 Health per 5 seconds
+1.2 Health per 5 seconds

6221.name: Explorer

6223.name: Tough Skin
description: You take 2 less damage from champion and neutral monster basic attacks

6231.name: Runic Armor
description: Shields, healing, regeneration, and lifesteal on you are 1.6% stronger
Shields, healing, regeneration, and lifesteal on you are 3.2% stronger
Shields, healing, regeneration, and lifesteal on you are 4.8% stronger
Shields, healing, regeneration, and lifesteal on you are 6.4% stronger

6241.name: Insight
description: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%

6242.name: Perseverance
description: +50% Base Health Regen, increased to +200% when below 25% Health

6251.name: Swiftness
description: +3% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+6% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+9% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+12% Tenacity and Slow Resist
+15% Tenacity and Slow Resist

6252.name: Legendary Guardian
description: +0.6 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion
+1.2 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion
+1.8 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion
+2.4 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion
+3 Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion

6261.name: Grasp of the Undying
description: Every 4 seconds in combat your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 3% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)

6262.name: Strength of the Ages
description: Siege minions and large monsters that you or nearby allied champions kill grant 20 and 10 permanent Health, respectively (300 max). After reaching the max bonus, siege minion kills restore 100 Health

6263.name: Bond of Stone
description: +2% Damage Reduction. While near an allied champion, this bonus is quadrupled and 8% of the damage they would take from champions is dealt to you instead (cannot reduce you below 15% Health)
